CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://secure.ncm20.com/PayHere/ConfirmQuote?QuoteId=" & QuoteNumber & "&Description=NCM%20Institute%20Training&Amount=" & TEXT(TotalPrice),IMAGE("servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015G0000001L1Hf&oid=00D760000004cfb&lastMod=1349791301000","Click here to pay securely online",80,100))
CustomField.label: Pay Now
